column2: Responsibilities       We are looking for a Senior Sales and Marketing Associate to join our Sales team. This position will be responsible for sales and marketing of our services including, research reports and subscription sales, news website and magazine advertising, and sponsorship sales for events and webinars. The candidate will serve as the primary contact responsible for new client acquisition and retaining existing clients.      The right candidate should have the ability to develop marketing presentation materials, sales proposals, make sales calls constantly, use social media for marketing, manage advertisement calendars, create advertising materials as needed, and perform other general marketing tasks as necessary.     We are looking for a motivated, organized, and detail-oriented candidate, a self-starter, a problem solver who has a positive attitude, and a team player who will care about the brands we are creating. We want someone passionate about sales with a history of closing the sale and who wants to push things forward every day in a positive way. The candidate should also be passionate about clean energy and the environment.     Please go through our website mercomindia.com. If this sounds like a good opportunity and you want to be part of a growing organization, please email us telling us why you would be a great candidate and include your resume.       Desired Profile of the candidate         Developing and implementing marketing campaigns         Create marketing plans and drive sales and marketing strategies         Come up with new revenue channels and product ideas         Driving sales initiatives across advertisement, research, and events through subscriptions and sponsorships; including the generation and conversion of leads         Creating new business by identifying profitable opportunities.         Email marketing experience         Must have experience developing marketing collateral using Adobe InDesign         Experience developing marketing presentations         Knowledge of basic HTML and WordPress         Must be well versed in professional email communications         Must be ready to make as many calls as needed in a day professionally for sales and relationship building         Must have excellent English speaking, writing, and editing skills         Ensure clients derive maximum value from our services         Travel and visit clients as needed to close the deals         Prepare implementation plans and lead client on-boarding; present content strategy and annual plan         Identify new opportunities from within existing accounts, partnering with the Business Development team to aid in increasing revenue         Manage multiple accounts; develop positive working relationships with all customer touchpoints         Drive reporting, client retention, renewals, upsells, and client satisfaction         Knowledge of corporate events, partnership opportunities, and various sponsorship sales         Collaborate with various media and Industry associations to drive maximum registrations for the events         Requirements:         Dynamic personality able to effectively engage and influence a variety of audiences at all levels of a business         Confident communication (written and oral) skills and a demonstrated ability to work collaboratively with all levels of internal and external organizations         A focus on relationships, able to gain trust through communication, expectation setting, and completion of planned deliverables         Business acumen, sound decision making, analytical and organizational skills in a fast-paced environment; a consultative approach to managing complex client relationships         Knowledge of key concepts including phases, plans, deliverables, scope, and tasks         Ability to prioritize multiple responsibilities, balancing client deliverables on multiple projects as well as internal obligations         Passion about business always thinking of ways to improve and grow clients         Strong analytical skills         Working knowledge and experience with contracts and contract negotiations         Demonstrated ability to work independently and remain motivated         Working knowledge of computers, CRM software, and Microsoft office suite of services

You will be responsible for:         The individual will drive key partnerships for MSME Lending. Responsible for driving key partnerships with for MSME Business Lending, by improving funnel, build growth strategy and improve conversion efficiency.         Develop and implement acquisition strategies to create demand, identify diverse lead generation sources, outbound and inbound campaign development etc         Review the market landscape, identify partners, review business model of potential partners to bring relevant partnerships.         Identify and partner with brands, to drive lending partnership in their value chain.         PnL ownership for the strategic partnerships and brand alliances for lending book.         what's in it for you         The experience of working in a highly entrepreneurial setup with a visionary team that is at the forefront of inspiring productivity and crushing business goals         Exposure to exploring limitless. possibilities and ideas no matter how impossible they may seem today.         Be a part of a team that pushes beyond the ordinary and thrives on transparency.         What will you bring to the table         Proven track record of managing all aspects of a successful product throughout its lifecycle.         Have market knowledge of small business lending.         Skilled at working effectively with cross-functional teams in a matrix organization.         Ability to be a self-starter and think strategically to independently drive business origination in the assigned market.         Experience focusing on the partnerships in digital lending.         You will fit the bill, if:         You are passionate about conceptualizing and building products for enterprise clients and vendors in the supply chain finance paradigm.     The educational qualification you'll need:      MBA Tier 1 college and Sales/Marketing education background preferred.         The perks of working at CredAble:         we've got benefits that go beyond just free food! We are a digital-first company that believes in embracing the future of work and investing in our people.         Comprehensive health insurance packages          Your physical and mental health is highly important to us. Which is why we have made employee health and workplace well-being our top priority. we've also got you covered with group health, parental and accidental insurance.         Unlimited sick leave         Struggling with serious health concerns ? We say, take em when you need em! Extended sick leave to help you'recover completely.         Paid time off         Every once in a while, we want you to be able to take a break rest, recharge and unwind in the company of your loved ones. This is why we have a month long sabbatical for newly married employees and for those who complete 3 years with the organization.         Parental leave with childcare monetary benefits         We get that parenthood is a big change bigger than many anticipate. Calling all new parents! Moms & Dads! Expansive maternity and paternity benefits which not only includes paid leaves but also work from home option, giving you time to spend with your newest member in the family. For new mothers flexible returning to work, a baby care allowance of Rs. 2.5 Lakh is provided.         Generous rewards         We celebrate our people with rewards, recognition and more! On achieving the company targets, you will be taken on a fun offsite. Outstanding contributors will be invited to the yearly offsite with the senior management and will also be given financial incentives for their performance. we've even got free merchandise and peer-cash bonuses for you!         Unlimited food on the house         From all-day snacks, gourmet evening refreshments, team lunches & dinners to monthly food allowances, we're making sure you never go hungry! Our Open Bar, Food and Game nights every quarter are quite a hit with the team. You can even invite your friends and family over for evening refreshments once a month!

column2: Serves customers by identifying their needs and engineering adaptations of products, equipment, and services.         Prospection of Key Accounts - Prospection is the process where we conclude the selection of key accounts that we would focus on in order to add value to them.         Lead Development - Contact, communicate and develop leads as per prospection.         Account Development - Plan Inventory, Ensure Timely Collection, Retain and Grow Market Share.         Customer Mapping - Mapping is a process where we study the key account in depth and understand the application, machinery and associated purchase trends. This process will also help us identify the importance and criticality of an application, what are the current gaps and how we can add value.         Customer Value Add Proposal - Must be able to highlight how value addition could be brought to the customer by means of our products and services.         Market Information - Competition remains dynamic and ever changing and in this environment it is essential to capture how the competition is addressing the environment and how we can better them.         Sales Reports - Prepare sales engineering reports by collecting, analyzing and summarizing sales information and engineering and application trends in the CRM.         Technical Knowledge - of Products and Services In order to provide technical and engineering information by answering questions and requests.         Training Grooming customers staff, by providing technical information and training.         Quotations - Making offers based on customer opportunities after making necessary analysis from the CRM.         Negotiating - Negotiating and concluding quotations.         Order Booking - Processing orders through CRM.         Relationship Building - Relationship building and rapport is essential to understand gaps and build influence.         Inventory Forecast - Inventory forecast based on forecasted customer requirements and ensuring smooth flow of projected inventory.         Collections - Ensuring timely collections and coordinate conclude underlying issues, hinderances to receiving collections.         Update Professional and Technical Knowledge - By attending educational workshops, reviewing professional publications, establishing personal networks and participating in professional societies.         Contribute to sales engineering effectiveness by identifying short-term and long range issues that must be addressed, recommending options and courses of action and implementing directives.         Compliance - Complies with national, state and local legal requirements by studying existing and new legislation and anticipating future legislation.

column2: Bid Manager supports the Sales effort of new equipment globally, pending project assignment.      The following responsibilities of this position apply to one or more of Siemens Energy CP Product Lines, which include the following:      Centrifugal Compressors (Single Shaft)        How You ll Make an Impact        Review the Client s Request for Quotation (RFQ)      Perform equipment selections including drivers and auxiliary systems, using company engineering tool, or other selection tools, as applicable for the product line.      Fully configure and propose optimized solution(s) with tangible value proposition.      Responsibility for Scope of supply, commenting Customer s Technical Specifications      Prepare Buyout RFQs. Evaluate communicates with vendors in close agreement with the Project Procurement Manager.      Coordinate the Cost Analysis and Prepare Pricing.      Establish the Payment Milestones, ensure alignment of sub-supplier payment terms.      Perform a Cash Flow Analysis.      Work with the Regional Coordination Group, Operation-based departments, shared services (e.g., Commercial Finance) and the Field Service organization, as required, to identify and quantify risks, develop mitigating actions to those risks, prepare the technical/execution risk assessment form.      Request guidance from the Sales Manager or Opportunity Leader for the commercial risk.      Coordinate Proposal Bill of Material, System Drawing Project Schedule.      Maintain Sales Force (CRM tool), as the need arises for those items under Bid Management area of responsibility.      Assist the Sales Managers in developing Technical and Commercial strategies for the successful implementation of the Order Collection Process.      Participate in the development of quantified Value Propositions.      Integration of technical activities, product, and services, including vendor supplied equipment/services in proposal in a timely manner to meet proposal deadlines.      Reviews the proposal process for compliance with established process, including proposal completeness, accuracy, degree of configuration, cash flow analyses, risk assessment forms (execution commercial), solution configuration, on-time submittals, etc.      Identify cost- or time-saving opportunities inside the proposal development process and implement process improvement initiatives.      Complete the Risk and Opportunity Analysis process prior to issuing new equipment proposals, paying particular focus on margin screens, currency risks, payment terms, cash flow, cancellation terms, and execution risks.      Review pricing for compliance with pre-established screens and price/scope agreement. Issues price recommendations for approval.      Coordinate and participate in client clarification meetings.      Understanding of client s applications and process.      Understanding of competition products offerings.      Prepare and submit in a timely manner the project pre-release and order entry packages to the manufacturing Operation. Participate, lead internal and client kick-off meetings.      Support the order collection team in preparing the internal approval documentation.      Support the Sales Manager with project or product presentations.      Conducts business affairs with the highest standards of ethics and integrity.        What You Bring        7 to 15 years of relevant work experience Mechanical, Electrical, or Chemical Engineering Degree or equivalent experience from an accredited higher education institution      Proficiency with Microsoft suite of programs and select engineering programs.      Excellent written, verbal communications and presentation skills.      Work well with others in a team environment.      Proficiency in spoken and written English language, bilingual international experience a plus.      Domestic and International travel is required to support training, project presentations, bid clarification and project kick off meetings.      Market awareness

column2: As a Key Account Manager / Growth Leader specializing in existing account farming, your primary responsibility will be to nurture and grow relationships with our current customers. You will focus on identifying and capitalizing on upselling, cross-selling, and renewal opportunities within assigned accounts. Your goal will be to maximize revenue, increase customer loyalty by identifying opportunities to add Value to the Customer Process and contribute to the overall Growth of the Account and Organization.         Key Responsibilities:         1. Account Management:   Serve as the main point of contact for assigned existing accounts.   Develop a deep understanding of customers business objectives, needs, and challenges.   Build and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders within the accounts.   Understand Company s strength and Key differentiators and use that to proactively identify opportunities to expand business and drive revenue growth within existing accounts.   2. Upselling and Cross-selling:   Identify upselling and cross-selling opportunities by analysing customers needs and services.   Present additional products, services, and upgrades to customers, highlighting their value and benefits.   Collaborate with internal teams (e.g., Product, Solutions, Support) to tailor offerings to customers specific requirements.   Negotiate contract renewals, pricing, and terms to maximize revenue potential.   3. Relationship Building:   Calendarize & conduct regular check-ins and face to face meetings with customers to maintain strong relationships.   Understand customers evolving needs and pain areas and proactively propose relevant solutions.   Anticipate and address potential issues or challenges to ensure customer satisfaction. Act as a trusted advisor to customers, providing expert guidance and support while keeping Company s interests in mind.   4. Forecasting and Reporting:   Track and manage Growth activities and opportunities within assigned accounts both in terms of headcount as well as Revenue.   Prepare accurate growth opportunity forecasts, reports, and account plans.   Provide regular updates to management on account status, progress, and potential risks. Implement strategies to increase customer loyalty and reduce churn rate.   Collaborate with the Customer Success team to ensure a seamless customer experience. column2: As the Distributor Success Manager you will bring experience in Channel Management and Business development with a focus on Distribution management.      You will work as part of the Sales Channel Management organization, acting as an important member of a diverse, global team and managing a portfolio of Distributors.      As the DSM you will act as first point of contact and will actively drive and participate in quarterly and annual business planning and execution to obtain business objectives and drive Acronis reach and adoption rate through Distributors to the market.     Every member of our A-Team has an instrumental role and impact on the success of Acronis innovative and growing business, so we are looking for someone who enjoys working in dynamic, global teams and thrives in a fast-paced and rapidly changing work environment.      Just like everyone at Acronis, the ideal candidate will embody all of our company values: responsive, alert, detail-oriented, makes decisions, and never gives up.         WHAT you'll DO:         Act as the first and main point of contact for Distributors with regards to executive communication, day-to-day business operations as well as business and technology development within respective business lines.     Build and sustain relationship with key decision makers and operational contacts on Distributors under responsibility     Drive and ensure evangelism and knowledge management on Distributor s end through rolling out tailored onboarding, training, and enablement programs.     Partner with Distributors on building a Go-to-Market strategy for on-premise and cloud-based solutions and drive engagement through effective annual and quarterly business planning and execution.     Facilitate and drive weekly, monthly and quarterly sales management calls and business reviews with each Distributor category/sales manager following sales process guidance provided.     Secure and expand Acronis share of wallet through adding new logos and leveraging Distributor s reach in service provider and reseller space.     Work effectively across segments (Consumer, Corp, OEM) and lines of business to maximize partner revenue potential.     Build and orchestrate a virtual cross-functional Account Team to deliver a best-in-class partner experience consisting of Sales Recruiter, Partner Success Manager, Regional Marketing Manager, Solution Engineer, Renewals Account Manager, and Technical Account Manager (if applicable).     Onboard and enable Distributors with Acronis sales and marketing tools and programs.     Align with Distributors for joint activities for new channel recruitment and enablement.     Ensure marketing execution planning and effective management of marketing budgets.     Create, implement, execute and oversee promotional and incentive campaigns through/with Distributor.     Effectively manage performance of individual sellers of Acronis on the Distributor s sales team.     Evaluate sales performance and proactively address areas of deficiency through performance improvement plans.     Address partner-related issues, sales conflicts and pricing issues in a timely manner     Manage and oversee Distributor sales pipeline and forecast.     Work with sales team to advance opportunities to closure, including Presales and support     Deliver monthly, quarterly and annual Distributor forecast/pipeline and business activity to the Acronis sales management team.     Enter account/opportunity details in SalesForce and provide timely and regular updates including revenue, status, decision makers and next steps     Grow incremental revenue/sales through the management of sales initiatives with Distributor.     Make a territory analysis and planning with Distributor(s) for dedicated geographies to identify top potential partners.     Stay current with latest developments in marketplace and competitor activities.     Enable data-driven decisions through return of investment oversight and analysis.     Drive and ensure compliance with Acronis programs, policies, processes, tools, and standard operating procedures     Key KPIs for the position: incremental revenue, churn rate (% of partners leaving the program), service provider and reseller reach, Distributors enablement status, and Acronis services attach rate.         WHAT YOU BRING (EXPERIENCE QUALIFICATIONS)         5+ years of total channel sales/development/account management experience     Experience working directly at/with Distributors will be considered an advantage     In-depth channel and field sales knowledge with understanding of the cloud market business model     Ability to sell through others and high-energy personality to deliver results     Proven record of success in achieving sales targets, and desire to perform in competitive industry     Solid strategic business development, planning and acumen, along with strong tactical implementation sales skills     Ability to navigate all altitudes within the partner org, from executives, line managers and individual sellers to marketers and specialists     Ability to develop, implement, execute and manage an annual channel partner business plan     Displays exceptional personal and business ethics and moral character     Strong internal customer focus with desire to learn all aspects of the business     Has strong functional, analytical and strategic thinking with project management skills     Leadership skills and ability to describe market trends and develop and lead virtual sales teams.     Experience with Key Performance Indicators (KPI) and return on investment (ROI) oversight will be considered an advantage     Regional travel may be required. Must be willing to travel, up to 50% of the time     Self-motivated with a high level of discipline, attention to detail, and ability to meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment while still maintaining a high-level of accuracy     Team-player with a positive attitude who thrives in a global environment, eager to do more and help out, views challenging situations as opportunities     Comfortable with ambiguity and willingness to adapt to changes in responsibilities and strategies     Strong presentational, communication, interpersonal, organizational, and time management skills     Fluent in English     Working knowledge of MS Office and CRM applications (Salesforce)     Passion and commitment to succeed by working hard and never giving up

column2: Gentleman Chits is looking for ASST BUSINESS MANAGER ( M ) to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey.A Business Manager is responsible for overseeing the day-to-day operations of a company or organization. Their main objective is to ensure that the business runs smoothly, achieves its goals and meets its financial targets.Here is a list of key responsibilities for a Business Manager:     Develop and implement business strategies: The Business Manager will work with the management team to develop and implement effective strategies that align with the organization's goals and objectives.     Operations management: The Business Manager is responsible for ensuring that all operations are running smoothly and efficiently, including production, distribution, and customer service.     Human resources management: This includes recruiting, training and managing staff, as well as creating a positive workplace culture.     Risk management: The Business Manager must identify potential risks to the business and develop strategies to mitigate these risks.     Customer relationship management: The Business Manager is responsible for maintaining strong relationships with customers and ensuring customer satisfaction.     Market analysis: The Business Manager must stay up-to-date with industry trends and market conditions to make informed decisions about the business.     Negotiations: The Business Manager may be required to negotiate contracts, prices and deals with suppliers, partners and customers.The ideal candidate for a Business Manager position should have excellent leadership and organizational skills and relevant experience in business management.

column2: 2+ years of experience in key account management or sales.       Proven experience in SAAS account management or sales, preferably in a B2B environment.         Strong understanding of SAAS products, services, and industry trends.         Ability to build and maintain strong relationships with clients, understanding their needs and providing tailored solutions.         Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets and driving revenue growth.         Strong communication, negotiation, presentation and interpersonal skills.       Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment.     Proficiency in Microsoft Office and CRM software.         Benefits               Work from anywhere effortlessly with our remote setup perk: Rs. 50,000 for furniture and headphones, plus an annual addition of Rs. 5,000.         We care about your well-being Our health scheme covers not only your physical health but also your mental and social well-being. Weve got you covered from head to toe!         Say hello to endless possibilities with our learning and growth opportunities. Were here to fuel your curiosity and help you reach new heights.         Take a breather and enjoy 30 annual paid leave days. Its time to relax, recharge, and make the most of your time off.         Lets celebrate! We love company outings and celebrations that bring the team together for unforgettable moments and good vibes.         Well reimburse your workation trips, turning your travel dreams into reality.         Weve got your lifestyle covered. Treat yourself with our lifestyle allowance, which can be used for food, OTT, health/fitness, and more. Plus, well reimburse your internet expenses so you can stay connected wherever you go                       Role Overview           We are searching for communicative candidates who are proactive and passionate about our products and the clients we serve     Account Managers will act as a point of contact for their clients     They will build long-lasting, mutually beneficial relationships with their contacts, always striving to find the products which best fit the individual needs of the client     As an Account Manager, you will be responsible for managing and growing the companys relationships with clients     You will be the primary point of contact for these clients and will be responsible for developing and executing account strategies to drive growth and achieve revenue targets     To be successful as an account manager, you should be able to analyze data and sales statistics and improve business and marketing strategies     Ultimately, an exceptional key account manager should be able to manage multiple key accounts without compromising on the quality of services provided       Responsibilities           Develop and maintain strong relationships with key clients.     Identify opportunities for upselling and cross-selling our SAAS products and services to existing clients.     Act as the primary point of contact for assigned accounts, addressing any issues or concerns, and providing timely and effective solutions.     Collaborate with the sales, marketing, and product teams to develop and execute account strategies that drive revenue growth and customer retention.     Understand the clients business and industry to identify opportunities for growth.     Analyze sales data and trends to form account strategies and forecast and track account metrics.     Negotiate contracts and pricing with clients.     Ensure timely resolution of concerns and issues.     Attend industry events, conferences, and networking opportunities to build relationships and promote Springworks products and services.         In 1 Month you will:             Fully understand our products, services, policies, and systems.     Familiarize with CRM and other necessary software.     Be introduced to key accounts, understand their business needs and goals.     Start building relationships with the key stakeholders of each client.         In 3 Months you will:         Develop strong client relationships and begin to independently handle client issues.     Consistently meet assigned quotas and objectives.     Begin to identify opportunities for upselling and cross-selling within current client base.     Understand industry trends and competitor activities.         In 6 Months you will:           Successfully meet and exceed sales targets.     Be fully capable of independently managing client accounts and resolving issues.     Develop strategies for retention and growth within current client base.     Start mentoring new account managers, if applicable.         Account Manager KPIs         Customer Retention Rate: A critical KPI for any Account Manager, this measures the percentage of clients that continue to use your service over a given period of time. A high retention rate signals good client satisfaction.     Net Promoter Score (NPS): This metric is used to gauge customer satisfaction and loyalty by asking clients how likely they are to recommend the company to others.     Average Revenue Per Account (ARPA): This metric reflects the revenue generated per account on average over a specific period. It helps measure the effectiveness of upselling and cross-selling efforts.     Customer Lifetime Value (CLTV): This metric forecasts the total revenue a business can reasonably expect from a single customer account.     Customer Churn Rate: The churn rate is the percentage of clients who stop using your product during a given period. A low churn rate indicates good customer loyalty and effective account management.     Expansion Revenue Rate: This KPI measures the percentage of revenue from existing customers due to upselling, cross-selling, or offering additional services.     Response and Resolution Time: This measures how quickly an Account Manager responds to and resolves client issues.
column11: Sales, Networking, KPI, Customer satisfaction, SAAS, Customer retention, Account management, Key account management, Team building, CRM

Responsibilities:   On Ground understanding of the markets of (Location)  territory   Establishes productive, professional relationships with key partner resources and partner owners in assigned partner accounts.   Sit at assigned partner offices and help drive the new license business and renewal business in accordance with agreed company objectives and set expectations with partners.   Meets assigned targets for profitable sales volume from partner accounts.   Proactively leads a joint partner planning process that develops mutual performance as per plans of ASM/RSM   Proactively assesses, clarifies, and validates partner needs on an ongoing basis   Sells through partner organizations to end users in coordination with partner sales resources.   Manages any potential channel conflict with other firm sales channels by fostering excellent communication internally and externally, and through adherence to channel partner policy   Coordinating the involvement of all necessary company and partner personnel.   Drives adoption of company programs among assigned partners.   Should be excellent in developing expertise on product/brands of the company & should be able to train the partner teams   Prior Experience of dealing with IT, B2B Software products will be an advantage  Skill Sets:   Good Communication & Execution Skills   Go Getter Attitude   Accountable for his business and responsibilities   Amazing sense of urgency & attitude of getting things done when no one is watching   Able to work comfortably in a fast-paced growing start-up environment  Qualifications:  Diploma/ Graduate/ Post-Graduate About Khatabook   Biz Analyst by Khatabook offers data-led business solutions to make meaningful business decisions for the MSME sector.  Growing from strength to strength since its founding in 2016.  The mobile application syncs securely with Tally ERP 9 & Tally  Prime and allows its user to access business data anytime, anywhere.  It is used by manufacturers, traders, wholesalers, retailers, and distributors, available on both iOS and Android. Biz Analyst by Khatabook continues with the growth spree with a dedicated 100+ employees and 2000+ channel partners catering to over  1,00,000 businesses across India, UAE, Africa, and Singapore.  To know more https://bizanalyst.in/  Are you passionate about solving roadblocks & challenges faced by MSMEs in India  MSMEs contribute significantly to India's total GDP. 90% of India's ~$1 Trillion Retail Market is controlled by MSMEs. Which means ~$900B worth of commerce flows through these ~60M MSMEs in the form of shops/kiosks/homes, scattered all over the country.  We at Khatabook, have built digital products that makes the MSMEs more efficient by managing their credit, and creating transparency in cash flow, henceforth increasing trust with their consumers and that paved the path for us to become India's fastest-growing fintech company.  Why work with us:  People are our biggest asset! At Khatabook, every one of us is a dynamic superstar. We have carefully bred an ecosystem which hires nothing but incredibly and exceptionally talented people who can dream, collaborate, experiment, and break new ground. We're a strong team that looks out for each other.  We exist to empower India's 60 Million strong MSMEs. Our users' motives, methodology, expectations and behavior are significantly different from our own when they interact with the internet and technology ecosystem which makes it harder to build for them, to solve that. Our first offering - is an Android App that has been downloaded over 10 crore times, which has resulted in having an active merchant base of over 9 million users.  As more businesses are adopting digital for business than ever before, Khatabook's goal can be summed up simply - Empowering merchants by simplifying their business by  ??Building a complete business management platform.  ??Providing the power of technology to an underserved segment.  ??Helping businesses to grow by providing them with ammunition of insights & digital reports. ??Offering a financial services platform catering to the specific needs of the MSME space.

column1: Key Accounts Manager / Business Development Manager
column2: Job Title: Key Account Manager   Location:  Gurugram Job Type:  Full-Time Reports to:  Managing Director Job Summary: The Key Account Manager will be responsible for identifying and engaging with potential white-labeling partners for contract manufacturing, pitching to other brands and companies to manufacture extension boards and other electronic products. The role involves establishing and maintaining strong relationships with key accounts, such as Amazon Solimo, Flipkart, and other prominent brands, to secure manufacturing contracts. Additionally, the Key Account Manager will develop a robust B2B offline network to promote and sell extension boards under our brand name.   Key Responsibilities: 1.  Identify and Engage White-Label Partners:  - Research and identify potential white-labeling opportunities for contract manufacturing.  - Initiate and maintain relationships with key decision-makers in target companies.  - Negotiate and finalize white-label contracts ensuring mutual benefit and adherence to company standards.   2.  Pitch to Brands and Companies:  - Develop and present compelling pitches to brands and companies for manufacturing extension boards and other electronic products.  - Collaborate with internal teams to tailor pitches that meet the specific needs of prospective clients.  - Follow up with leads, negotiate terms, and close deals to achieve sales targets.   3.  Build and Manage Key Accounts:  - Establish and nurture relationships with key accounts like Amazon Solimo, Flipkart, and other major brands.  - Ensure consistent communication, address client needs, and provide excellent customer service to maintain long-term partnerships.  - Monitor account performance and provide regular updates and reports to senior management.   4.  Develop B2B Offline Sales Network:  - Create and implement strategies to build a strong B2B offline sales network.  - Identify and engage potential distributors, retailers, and partners to expand the reach of extension boards under our brand.  - Organize and participate in trade shows, industry events, and networking opportunities to promote products and generate leads.   5.  Market Analysis and Strategy:  - Conduct market research to identify trends, competitor activities, and potential opportunities.  - Develop and execute strategic plans to penetrate new markets and increase market share.  - Provide feedback and insights to product development and marketing teams to align offerings with market demands.   6.  Performance Monitoring and Reporting:  - Track and report on key performance indicators (KPIs) and sales metrics.  - Analyze sales data to identify areas for improvement and develop action plans.  - Prepare regular reports for senior management on progress, challenges, and achievements.   Qualifications: - Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field. - Proven experience in key account management, sales, or business development, preferably in the electronics manufacturing industry. - Strong understanding of white-labeling and contract manufacturing processes. - Excellent negotiation, communication, and presentation skills. - Ability to build and maintain strong relationships with clients and partners. - Strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities. - Ability to work independently and as part of a team. - Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and CRM software.   Additional Requirements: - Willingness to travel as needed to meet clients and attend industry events. - A proactive and results-oriented mindset with a strong sense of responsibility and integrity.   Salary:  50,000 To 100,000

column2: Sales operational Management Description - Job Summary This role is responsible for leading a team of individual contributors within the sales operations function, providing guidance, and handling challenges while ensuring alignment with organizational goals. The role manages operational processes across the sales cycle, nurtures strategic relationships, and shares expertise with the internal teams. The role focuses on driving continuous process improvement and enhancing the teams performance while ensuring compliance with policies. Responsibilities Manages a team of individual contributors and supervisors across multiple job families within the sales operations function providing guidance and ensuring they are aligned with the organization's goals and objectives. Sets the direction for assigned teams and holds accountability for the deliverables while managing expenses effectively. Fosters strategic relationships with clients and internal stakeholders to create cutting-edge solutions for customers and partners, leveraging both internal and external resources. Manages the execution of operational processes across a complete sales cycle to meet service-level objectives and targets. Offers consulting expertise to project and account teams in developing customer-centric solutions and provides feedback on processes and capabilities. Ensures that expense objectives are met while maintaining the team's effectiveness in supporting sales operations. Drives continuous improvement in sales operations processes to enhance efficiency and effectiveness. Manages recruitments, performance goals, and career development, ensuring the availability of necessary tools and resources to support the team and optimize processes. Utilizes customer and sales data to generate insights for customer and business decisions. Ensures all customer issues and concerns are addressed, resolved, or escalated in compliance with legal and organizational policies. Education & Experience  Recommended Four-year or Graduate Degree in Sales, Marketing, Business Administration, Accounting, or any other related discipline or commensurate work experience or demonstrated competence. Typically has 7-10 years of job-related experience or 5-7 years of management experience, preferably in sales, sales support, people management, sales process improvement, or a related field. Preferred Certifications Certified Sales Operations Professional (CSOP) Project Management Professional (PMP) Certification Knowledge & Skills Balancing (Ledger/Billing) Business Development Business To Business Cash Register Customer Relationship Management Dashboard Data Analysis Finance Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) Marketing Merchandising Process Improvement Sales Management Sales Operations Sales Process Sales Prospecting Sales Strategy Sales Support Salesforce Selling Techniques Cross-Org Skills Customer Centricity Prioritization Resilience Team Management Strategic Thinking Impact & Scope Impacts function and leads projects requiring understanding of multiple disciplines or areas of HP. Complexity Uses managerial concepts and company objectives to resolve issues in creative and effective ways. Disclaimer This job description describes the general nature and level of work performed in this role. It is not intended to be an exhaustive list of all duties, skills, responsibilities, knowledge, etc. These may be subject to change and additional functions may be assigned as needed by management. Shift - No shift premium (India)

column2: The Revenue Enablement and Operations organization is at the intersection of Marketing, Account Development, Sales, Services, and Finance        It encompasses Field Operations, Deal Strategy, Platforms, Analytics, Incentive Compensation, and Revenue Enablement        Tha Manager, Revenue Enablement & Operations, plays a crucial role in maximizing Highspot s revenue by developing and implementing effective strategies      This leadership position requires a combination of analytical skills, business acumen, and strategic thinking to optimize revenue streams across various departments      This includes collaboration with key stakeholders, analyzing market trends, and developing innovative approaches to drive revenue growth        Candidates must be willing to work a schedule that allows at least 4 hours of overlap with a 9am-5pm PST work schedule                What you'll Do          Lead and oversee a team of Revenue Enablement practitioners for daily local management. Members of the Revenue Enablement team will maintain a secondary dotted-line reporting relationship with the Sr Director Revenue Enablement.      Establish an effective working cadence and collaboration processes to synchronize the efforts of the Indian Enablement team with those of their counterparts in the North American Enablement team.      Ensure project management and transparency through consistent AirTable updates and team communication.      Network team with related Hyderabad based SMEs for ongoing development and troubleshooting      Serve as the primary point of contact and escalation point to the Sr Director, Revenue Enablement as needed.          Enablement Specialization includes:            1. Process and Tool Enablement    - You will be responsible for working with the larger Enablement team to establish the strategy and plan/prioritization for process and tool enablement for our internal teams, including both the JIT and formal training strategy. You will delegate execution and build of Process and Tool enablement to local team member.        2. Enablement Operations    - Manage an individual that supports Highspot platform administration, execution, governance, reporting and design elements. The role takes on a combination of platform administration, design thinking and project management - maximizing the role of Highspot platform to scale content, learning and drive key initiatives & programs company wide.        3    .    Instructional Design    - Manage an individual that is responsible for course builds, governance and learning asset design (SCORM file development, video editing, Canva builds, etc) that bring internal and external learning to life. The role takes on a combination of instructional design and design thinking - maximizing the role of Highspot technology to scale learning and drive the right sales behaviors and messaging - all with a focus on driving engagement and action.          Revenue Operations: Process, Systems and Tools          Lead and oversee an anticipated small team of SFDC and Marketo administrators. As with Revenue Enablement, members of the Revenue Operations team located in India will maintain a dotted-line reporting relationship with the Manager of Marketing Operations and the Director of Platforms, both within the global Revenue Operations team.      Ensure the system administrators in India are integral to and integrated with the Global Revenue Operations team via working cadences, collaboration and transparency.      Serve as the primary point of contact and escalation point to the Manager of Marketing Operations and the Director of Platforms.      In collaboration with the North America Revenue Operations team, assist with the life-cycle of the local India team: recruitment, onboarding, performance management and retention.          Operational Specialization:    The administrators this managerial role will oversee will be accountable for solving business problems by customizing the SFDC and Marketo platforms: build, configure and automate solutions.        Activities will include, but not be limited to:          System assessment and configuration      Account Management      Troubleshooting      Data maintenance      Ticket Management      Development and maintenance of reports and dashboards      Management and integration of third-party applications          Cross-Functional Collaboration          Collaborate with sales, marketing, finance, and revenue operations, and revenue teams to align revenue strategies with overall business objectives.      Utilize data analytics to assess revenue performance, customer behavior, and market dynamics.          Performance Metrics and Reporting          Define key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success of products and programs.          Your Background          Bachelors degree in business, finance, economics, or a related field.      5+ years of experience in people management preferred.      Proven experience in revenue enablement, revenue operations, or a related field.      Excellent communication and leadership skills to collaborate effectively across departments.      Knowledge of market trends, industry best practices, and emerging technologies in revenue management/enablement.      Experience in contract negotiation and pricing strategy.      Familiarity with Salesforce, Marketo and the GTM tech stack.      Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment

column2: Technical Account Manager / Sr. Technical Account Manager (Sales) Whats the role? We are looking for a high potential candidate with strong business acumen to unleash high potential at Hilti, starting as Account Manager. This is no ordinary job. Our people come from all different backgrounds with a shared dedication to high performance, consistent results and outstanding customer service. Who is Hilti? If youre new to the industry, you might not have heard of us. We provide leading-edge tools, technologies, software and services for the global construction sector. We have a proud heritage, built over 80 years, and a worldwide reputation for pioneering products and exceptional service. With some 32,000 people in more than 120 countries, were a great place for you to show us your worth as you learn, grow and carve-out your career. What does the role involve? As an Account manager, youll be visiting our customers, wherever theyre busy working, to find out how we can help them. You could find yourself on construction sites and nuclear plants or in offices and warehouses. Ours is a model of professional, consultative selling and its a really hands-on job. It means rolling up your sleeves to demonstrate some of the most pioneering products in the industry, while selling our state-of-the-art software along with all the services and aftercare that come with the Hilti name. Far from traditional cold calling, its about building relationships with warm and responsive customers and helping them find the most innovative and cost-efficient solutions for their needs. What do we offer? Well give you everything you need to excel in your role, including your own van full of tools and one-to-one coaching. Youll enjoy a rare combination of autonomy and camaraderie, as youll manage your own diary while being part of a friendly team. Well give you lots of responsibility, including your own portfolio of customers, and these might be trades experts, project managers or company leaders. From there, we??l trust you to do whatever it takes to deliver outstanding results. Go the extra mile and we??l reward you with unrivalled training, development and career opportunities as soon as you??e ready for the next challenge. Day to day, you??l report to your Area Sales Manager, who will also be there to help you manage your career. Why should you apply? We have an excellent mix of people, which we believe makes for a more vibrant, more innovative, more productive team. So, if you??e never worked in construction, that?? fine with us. Success at Hilti is down to teamwork and ability, regardless of your background. What you need is:  B.E / B.Tech from a reputed Engineering college  At least 3 - 8 year of sales experience or equivalent customer facing experience in the construction industry  Excellent communication and interpersonal skills  Dynamic personality with strong winning and high performance mindset  Ability to thrive both independently and in a team environment  Self-motivated and a quick learner  Highly adaptable with a ??an-do??attitude

Others     : We provide a unique culture that is a mix of causal and hip. column2: We are looking for a high potential candidate with strong business acumen to unleash high potential at Hilti, starting as Account Manager. This is no ordinary job. Our people come from all different backgrounds with a shared dedication to high performance, consistent results and outstanding customer service.       What does the role involve           As an Account manager, you'll be visiting our customers, wherever they're busy working, to find out how we can help them     You could find yourself in construction sites or warehouse or manufacturing units of remote locations     Ours is a model of professional, consultative selling and it s a really hands-on job     It means rolling up your sleeves to demonstrate some of the most pioneering products in the industry, while selling our state-of-the-art software along with all the services and aftercare that come with the Hilti name     Far from traditional cold calling, it s about building relationships with warm and responsive customers and helping them find the most innovative and cost-efficient solutions for their needs         What do we offer         we'll give you everything you need to excel in your role, including your own car full of tools and one-to-one coaching     you'll enjoy a rare combination of autonomy and camaraderie, as you'll manage your own diary while being part of a friendly team     we'll give you lots of responsibility, including your own portfolio of customers, and these might be trades experts, project managers or company leaders     From there, we'll trust you to do whatever it takes to deliver outstanding results     Go the extra mile and we'll reward you with unrivalled training, development and career opportunities as soon as you re ready for the next challenge     Day to day, you'll report to your Area Sales Manager, who will also be there to help you manage your career         What you need is:         B.E / B.Tech / Engineering from a reputed college      3-8 years of experience in Construction sector/ Industrial sales experience or equivalent customer facing experience environment      Self-motivated and a quick learner      Highly adaptable with a can-do attitude

column2: The role requires developing and implementing an effective and coordinated customer marketing plan in support of organizational and marketing and sales business unit strategies alongside the Sales Manager (ie Global Accounts as applicable) and other globally or regionally driven efforts (eg category management).                              This is also customer facing role supporting the corporation with recognized customers and/or relevant organizations, partners and suppliers within the market/s as it relates to the function.                              The associate customer marketing role is expected to support and leverage partnerships with the Retailers & Distributors in WTR for the markets under the business unit.                              A specific expectation for this associate customer marketing role is to support and manage an identified customer in the market.                              This entails, with the support of the Sales Manager, the delivery of a customer engagement plan and the creation and enforcement of standard sales metrics for the account / customer in the identified key markets and / or pilot markets.                                 The Associate Customer Marketing Manager will be a key member of the commercial team to:                               Support overall marketing strategies in region/ channel specific activation plans                              Identifies opportunities to grow Hershey s brands with tailored activities by channel/clients                              Ensure effective and consistent cascade of Marketing strategies to Retailers & Distributor s team                             Supports commercial opportunities (New Markets, New Channels, New Occasions) as we'll as refining current business through test and learn eg digital / new seasons                             Define, Track and Build corrective measures of Commercial KPIs in collaboration with sales and marketing                             Develop commercial insights (Channel, Customer and Shopper) to foster the brand strategies                              Respond to business requests; support the resolution of critical customer specific needs                             Support external partnerships for new business opportunities.                              Enhance customer relationships through resolving issues and sharing insights and knowledge that can further enable business growth                              Evaluate, measure and monitor responses to programs; establish criteria for success                             Participate in key customer appointments to identify areas of growth                                 Major Duties/Responsibilities:                                                 ?                   MARKET STRATEGIES                                  Collaborate with sales team to identify opportunities and develop strategies that meet customer and business growth expectations                                 Seek internal resourcing, alignment and approvals as necessary                                  Manage agencies, partnerships, resourcing to ensure success                                  Support relationships with Retailers and Distributors customer marketing counterparts                                 Supports understanding to grow the business through effective customer marketing and sales organization, channel and key customer strategies at trade / customer level for specific markets | customers and or geographic areas under the business unit.                                 Communicates and consistently monitors progress of the execution of the customer marketing strategy with internal and external stakeholders.                                 Helps develop and execute joint business plans with customer and distributor partners and identified key customers within markets.                                 In all called out areas below, the role will comply with or develop the right measurable at all levels to ensure delivery and visibility of progress (or the lack of it) in achieving customer marketing or business goals.                                 Working in close coordination with key customers to provide category and shopper insights enabling Hershey s to build stronger trade partnerships. This will be through programs that drive category sales via increased number of shoppers, transaction size per purchase and purchase frequency.                                 Develop and share channel and customer insights with Marketing and Sales                                   BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT                                 Monitor and understand trends, work closely with shopper insights group, category team and marketing to develop insights and ideas that can be leveraged to ground and support new business recommendations.                               Supports the where to win and how to win trade, customer and shopper programs that deliver the outcomes required with clear marketing, sales and financial deliverables.                                  CUSTOMER MARKETING PROGRAM EXECUTION                                  Leads the development, execution and evaluation of agreed customer marketing programs designed to make Hershey s win in-store, give Hershey brands the highest weighted distribution among competitive set and drive strong consumer off take for Hershey s products.                                 Develops with the commercial team to deliver the respective customer marketing plans and the customer marketing calendar (annual promotions calendar) to support the business unit s innovation plans.                                 Provide sales inputs and final sign-off on all promotional materials to be used for key initiatives and coordinate closely with Key Accounts and Distributors in the supervision of all promotional activities.                      Other deliverables include but are not limited to:                     Supporting the development of the business unit s customer marketing and category management processes and solutions together with key internal and external customers to grow Hershey s product categories.                                 Supporting the development, implementation and evaluation of category plans to meet business objectives.                                 Delivers adequate and relevant sales training (for customer marketing topics) directly and as required                                  It is expected that the role manages customer marketing support systems internally in the areas of trade/ consumer promotions, merchandising and sales analysis.                                    MARKET INSIGHTS AND ANALYSIS                                   Provide leadership in driving for efficiency improvement of all customer investments                                 Conduct/coordinate analytical support to improve ROI, program results                                  Identify market trends and issues and convert into actions that drive growth of business                                 Co- owns and co- leads the execution of a healthy P&L for the market which includes but is not limited to: total business, brands, channel and customer P&L and most importantly the management of trade spend.                                  He or she articulates the right and relevant financial deliverables with respect to channels, customers for the market which reflect the investment in the marketing strategies.                                  He or she also owns the execution of the appropriate levels of control and audit processes within the sales organization and with the customers and distributor partners in the area of trade spend or customer spend. It is his or her responsibility to coordinate both reporting and funding requirements with key internal and external partners with the region or sub-region.                                  He or she has a full understanding of distributor and/or customer financials and drives and influences the directions taken by distributors and key customers toward financial expectations of the Hershey Company.                     Specifically: This role                     Manages and evaluates trade promotion levels to achieve maximum returns.                                 Is responsible for the management and monitoring of Customer Marketing Budgets                                  Puts in place, monitors and improves processes to link all Marketing activities with the activities of the Sales Managers/Business Managers. column2: Position   Title   Ass. Manager/Manager/ Senior Manager/ AVP  Business   Unit/Service   Line   Commercial Leasing  Location   India  POSITION OVERVIEW   We are searching for a seasoned and driven Commercial Real Estate Sales Manager with strong business development skills to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will possess a proven track record of success in commercial real estate sales and management, with the ability to drive business growth, foster strong client relationships, and ensure the continued success of our commercial real estate sales division.  ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:   Business Development: Drive the expansion of our commercial real estate portfolio by identifying new business opportunities, cultivating relationships with potential clients, and expanding our market presence.  Team Leadership: Lead, inspire, and guide a team of commercial real estate sales professionals to achieve and surpass sales targets, with a strong focus on business development.  Sales Strategy: Develop and execute effective sales strategies, tactics, and action plans specifically tailored to the commercial real estate market and business growth objectives.  Client Relationship Management: Cultivate and manage relationships with commercial clients, exceeding their real estate requirements and expectations, and identifying opportunities for repeat business and referrals.  Market Expertise: Stay abreast of market trends, competition, and opportunities within the commercial real estate sector, identifying potential areas for business expansion.  Performance Analysis: Monitor and analyze the performance of the commercial real estate sales team, providing regular reports to senior management, with a focus on business development KPIs.  Budget Oversight: Effectively manage the budget allocated to the commercial sales department, allocating resources strategically for business growth.  Sales Presentations: Conduct presentations and negotiations with commercial clients, addressing their unique needs and demonstrating the value of our business development services.  Compliance: Ensure that the commercial sales team operates in full compliance with applicable laws and regulations while pursuing business development opportunities.  QUALIFICATION & EXPERIENCE:   MBA  Finance / CA / CFA / real estate?  SKILLS:   Excellent written and verbal communication skills  Strong analytical skills.  Ability to provide efficient, timely, reliable, and courteous service to customers.  Ability to effectively present information.  Requires advance knowledge of financial terms and principles. Basic understanding of approaches to value of real estate assets.

column2: We are seeking a dynamic and motivated individual to join our team as a Manager - Learner Retention.       The primary responsibility of this role is to lead a team dedicated to supporting online learners in completing their degrees and progressing academically.       The successful candidate will play a crucial role in ensuring high retention rates, enhanced learner experience, and supporting learners through their academic journey.       The person will be responsible for fostering an environment of ownership, accountability while effectively managing internal and external stakeholders.       If you are passionate about supporting learners in their academic journey and possess the leadership skills necessary to drive success, we invite you to apply for this challenging and rewarding role.           Key Responsibilities:       1. Team Leadership:       - Lead, mentor, and inspire a team of academic support professionals by setting clear performance expectations and goals for them     - Foster a collaborative and proactive team culture.     - Establish and implement quality assurance measures to evaluate the effectiveness of the team members and ensure alignment with organizational goals and standards       2. Retention Strategy:       - Develop and implement strategies to ensure high learner retention rates.     - Ensure excellent learner experience to achieve industry leading metrics for key milestones       3. Academic Support:       - Oversee the resolution of academic and non-academic queries from learners.     - Collaborate with academic advisors and faculty to address learner concerns effectively.       4. Proactive Approach:       - Identify and address potential challenges proactively to enhance the overall learner experience.     - Implement initiatives to engage learners and encourage academic progress.       5. Stakeholder Management:       - Build and maintain strong relationships with internal and external stakeholders     - Collaborate with product, technology, finance, sales, and partner academic institutions to streamline processes.       6. Data Analysis:       - Utilize data and analytics to assess learner progress and identify areas for improvement.     - Implement data-driven strategies to enhance team performance and learner outcomes.       7. Continuous Improvement:       - Continuously evaluate and enhance support processes to better serve the needs of learners.     - Stay updated on industry best practices and incorporate relevant advancements into the support framework.       8. Communication:       - Communicate effectively with learners, addressing concerns and providing timely updates.     - Ensure clear and transparent communication within the team and with other departments.     Qualifications:     - Bachelors degree in a related field; Masters degree preferred.     - Proven experience in a similar role, with a minimum of 5 years in a managerial capacity.     - Strong leadership and team management skills.     - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.     - Demonstrated ability to collaborate with various stakeholders.     - Proactive mindset with the ability to identify and address challenges efficiently.     - Familiarity with online learning platforms and educational technologies.     - Analytical skills for data-driven decision-making.

column2: What Youll Do: Business Strategy Know the Customer: Deeply understand customer behavior and develop new customer insights. Own the Business: Co-own the P&L, develop the business model, identify opportunities, and create viable business solutions. Know the Market: Stay on top of trends in an ever-changing landscape, find opportunities, and prioritize based on size and internal capabilities. Know the Competition: Understand both online and offline players. Ensure Flipkarts selection stays ahead of the competition. Influence Leadership: Convert strategies into action by liaising with cross-functional leadership and driving the necessary changes. Vendor Management Relationship Building: Develop deep and long-standing relationships with vendors to drive both strategic and tactical partnerships. Business Terms: Own the terms of business with vendors, including products, returns, and ordering. Vendor Engagement: Ensure high vendor engagement and make them partners in driving category changes. Market Understanding Market Knowledge: Develop a thorough understanding of market trends, both short-term and long-term. Competitive Analysis: Have in-depth knowledge of competitors and vendors, and the ability to influence market dynamics. Industry Best Practices: Develop and implement industry best practices, and lead market changes. Portfolio Management: Manage buying costs and overall product portfolio to ensure the best offers and discounts for customers. Purchasing and Inventory Working Capital Management: Drive key initiatives in working capital and inventory management. Purchase Strategy: Develop and manage purchase strategies with brands to ensure optimal cost and service. What Youll Need: Educational Background: Graduation and MBA from a Tier 1 institute (6+ years of experience). Industry Knowledge: Knowledge of the retail consumer goods industry is a plus. Customer Focus: Desire and ability to think like the customer. Execution Skills: Ability to translate strategies into execution plans and complete them. Analytical Skills: Highly analytical and capable of taking calculated risks. Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with strong interpersonal abilities. Technological Acumen: Strong understanding of technology and business. Learning Agility: Must be willing to learn and adapt. People Skills: Ability to connect with people across teams and levels. Bias for Action: Strong inclination towards taking action, with Flipkart operating at a very rapid pace.
column11: Business Development, Business Strategy, Portfolio Management, Vendor Management, Competitive Analysis

column2: We are seeking dynamic and experienced Key Account Managers to join our team      The Key Account Manager will be responsible for managing and growing relationships with key schools and colleges      As a Key Account Manager, you will be responsible for ensuring they understand and appreciate our endeavours in the areas of education and student development, engage with us as a valued partner on an enduring basis, and that their needs are met and that they receive exceptional service      Further, you will identify new business opportunities and bgring them to fruition      This role requires end-to-end ownership of the sales funnel while alsosupporting service delivery for the respective client account      You should be willing to travel extensively to attend meetings, conventions and for demos      You should be able to analyze data and sales statistics and improve business and marketing strategies      Ultimately, an exceptional key account manager should be able to manage multiple key accounts without compromising on the quality of services provided              Areas of Responsibility:          Developing and managing strong relationships with key decision makers in the accounts -B2B (Schools, Colleges, Universities)          Understand the unique needs and challenges of each institution and provide tailored solutions.          Act as the main point of contact for schools and colleges, addressing any issues or concerns they may have.          Collaborate with internal teams to ensure the timely delivery of products/services and resolve any issues that may arise.          Develop and implement strategies to grow the business with existing accounts and acquire new accounts, including cross-sell and up-sell opportunities.          Negotiation and contracting with clients, including thorough documentation.          Prepare regular reports and updates on account status, sales performance, and market trends.          Stay informed about industry trends, competitor activities, and market developments.          Revenue Goal :          Individual KRAs, established on monthly, quarterly and yearly basis          Program Delivery:          Supports Project team in on campus and online program delivery.          Coordinates with project team on schedules.          Ensures high CSAT score along with project team.          Technical Competencies:    Proficient in Microsoft Office applications as well as familiarity with CRM software (e.g. Sales force), would be a plus.        Functional Competencies:          Product Knowledge, Selling skills, Communication skill, Negotiation skills, Customer service skills.          Should have a Degree or Diploma in sales, Business Administration or related field.          Proven experience in Key Account Management and delivering client- focused solutions.          Availability    :        Should be available to work on weekends, if needed. Compensatory off will be provided in lieu of weekend working.          Should be willing to travel Nationally Internationally          External Stakeholders:          School SPOCS          Parents          Students          Internal Stakeholders:          All Departments          Founders

column2: Job Responsibilities: Showcase, promote, and sell the company's medications to physicians and relevant healthcare professionals primarily in fields such as pain and palliative care, oncology, and neuropsychiatry. Schedule and coordinate appointments with doctors, pharmacists, hospital medical teams, and other healthcare professionals, including both pre-arranged appointments and proactive 'cold' calling efforts to promote company medications. Contribute to the development and execution of the companys business strategy, providing valuable insights and feedback for 360-degree strategy refinement. Participate in sales meetings, conference calls, training sessions, and symposium circuits to stay informed and engaged with the company's objectives and initiatives. Regularly attend company meetings, technical data presentations, and briefings to stay up-to-date with the latest medical information provided by the company. Interpret, present, and discuss the latest medical data with healthcare professionals during presentations, ensuring they are well-informed about the company's products. Provide competitive intelligence, including bid situations, pricing data, and bundling arrangements, to facilitate negotiated pricing contracts for assigned products. Gather, analyze, and relay field information to assist the company in developing strategies and products aligned with quality and safety testing standards. Qualification Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Pharmacy (B.Pharm or D.Pharm), Sciences (B.Sc.), Business Administration (BBA), or a related field. Proficiency in MS Office applications. Minimum of 5 years' experience as a sales representative or 1-2 years' experience as an Area Business Manager in the pharmaceutical or healthcare products industry (or a similar role). Familiarity with databases, statistics, product lines, and current medical issues. Skills: Confidence, determination, persistence, and a strong desire to learn. Effective planning, analytical, leadership, and organizational abilities. Adaptability to changes, especially in healthcare systems or product and drug formularies. Proficiency in general IT and administrative tasks. Dedication, self-motivation, and a focus on achieving success. Loyalty, intelligence, and honesty in all dealings. Basic knowledge of drugs and the pharmaceutical market. Proficiency in English language. Outstanding verbal and written communication, negotiation, and sales skills. Solid understanding of human anatomy and microbiology. Strong problem-solving capabilities. Preferably, a background in science. Ability to proactively pursue customers. Punctuality and time management skills. Aptitude for building strong relationships with customers. Capability to identify and capitalize on opportunities. Ability to thrive under pressure. Fluency in the local language is advantageous. What to expect: Achieving sales target assigned by the company Opportunities occur throughout India, but the job usually involves responsibility for a particular geographical area. Smart dress and a professional appearance are essential. The working day can be long due to the travelling time involved and you may need to socialise with clients or conduct presentations in the evenings, for example.
column11: pharma sales, Medical sales, Key account manager, Medical Representative, medical marketing
